Package paint.shared.validate

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractFileValidator
    Abstract superclass for all CSV file validators in PAINT.
    ConditionConsistencyChecker
    Performs cross-row consistency checks for condition metadata in PAINT experiment CSVs.
    ExperimentInfoValidator
    Validates the structure and data of experiment_info.csv.
    ImageRootValidator
    Validates that all required experiment and image directories exist, and that each recording flagged for processing in an Experiment Info file has a corresponding `.nd2` image file in the expected location.
    RecordingsValidator
    Validates the structural and logical integrity of recordings.csv.
    SquaresValidator
    Validates the schema of squares.csv by checking header correctness and column data types according to PaintConstants.SQUARES_COLS and PaintConstants.SQUARES_TYPES.
    TracksValidator
    Validates the schema of tracks.csv by checking header correctness and column data types according to PaintConstants.TRACKS_COLS and PaintConstants.TRACKS_TYPES.
    ValidationHandler
    Central coordinator for validating multiple experiment CSV files within a PAINT project.
    ValidationResult
    Represents the aggregated result of one or more validation processes.
